tika-vin09t11:1: Dutiye idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t11:2: Tatiye ‘‘samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedana’’nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t11:3: Catutthe paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ alabhitvā aññaṃ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
